questions.question: It’s the morning of the Bug-Off and you have to catch as many as possible. Where do you look first?

answers.content: Up in a high tree, there’s gotta be critters all the way up there.
Ew, GROSS! I’m not touching bugs...
I think I saw some in my laundry?
The flowers around my house.
The museum, duh!
Make loops of the island and do my best!
The bugs cannot resist my charms, they will come to me.
Sunbathe in a flower field and see what crawls into my net
Swimming around the island and catching fish with my bare hands.
I stand by the coral reefs and see which fish has the most style.
The rocks so I can bring my BBQ.
Sitting on the pier and taking a nap while I wait for a bite.
Make friends with a shark and ride them out to sea.
A quiet pond where I can read my book and talk to the frogs.
Expensive fish markets.
I ask my fish friends where the coolest places to hang out are.

questions.question: K.K. is in town, what song are you requesting?

answers.content: Something loud that we can mosh to!
A secret song, you haven’t heard of it.
I don’t remember but it’s the one that goes “memo meme me mo”
WHO?
One that we can duet together!
I’ll let him choose, he knows his songs best!
Something moody that will sound good while I write my memoir.
One that’s upbeat and will get us all dancing.

questions.question: If time travel existed, what period of time would you visit?

answers.content: I wanna be a cowboy and throw a lasso!
The 90s had the best fashion!
Let’s ride dinosaurs around the island, heh.
Back to the good old days when my bones didn’t ache.
I wanna go to the early 2000s and find my favourite discontinued lipgloss
The medieval times like in a romance novel!
100 years into the future to see what cool inventions exist.
Let’s go to the 60s and see all the great bands live!
Vaporwave (bright colours make me happy)
Parisian chic, give me a canal and cafes!
Trashcore (storage is for chumps)
What does all of this mean just do what you want!
Tropical, duh!
Cottagecore (I love flowers and jam)
A murder mystery island
Anything spooky

questions.question: Which NPC would you take on a picnic?

answers.content: Gullivarrr so we can discuss his pirate adventures
Saharah would bring a great picnic blanket that I would take home by accident...
Leif looks like he has good snacks
Blathers so he can tell me all about the fossils
Label! Then give each other makeovers
Isabelle so she can get a break!
Redd so he can tell me where you get the expensive artifacts
Celeste because we can discuss my star sign
Outdoorsy fishing rod because it makes me feel like a pro
Whichever matches my outfit
Colorful fishing rod (such a cute ducky)!
Whatever gets the job done, I don’t care
The star net because I’m a star
The printed design shovel, look at those flowers!
Gold shovel so everyone can see how great I am
Elephant watering can so I can customise to fit my many moods

questions.question: And lastly, which is the best flower?

answers.content: Blue roses
Lily of the valley
Whatever I can grow, I don’t understand hybrids!
Green mums
Pink lilies
White cosmos
Gold roses
Purple hyacinths

results.Peppy: You’re a social butterfly and love making detailed plans with your friends. They may hate you for waking them up at 5am but they always make unforgettable memories when they’re with you. Your confidence and amazing energy mean that your friends all look up to you (even though you might not realise it). A natural leader and main character, people are always excited to have you around.
results.Lazy: You appreciate the finer things in life: food, naps and friendship. Your relaxed nature puts those around you at ease and you’ll always be the first person people invite to dinner. Your calming attitude is the perfect antidote to the business of life and people seek you out for a relaxing hang out. As the perfect person to sit in comfortable silence with, you tend to make long lasting friendships.
results.Cranky: You’re an old soul but there’s nothing wrong with that! You may find it difficult to make friends but you’re extremely loyal once you do. That hard outer shell really does hide a soft and kind soul. You may not like loud festivals, but people know if they ever need a quiet weekend away you’re the one to call.
results.Snooty: You know your worth and you’re not going to stand for anything less. Good for you! You’re the main character of your own life and you have a really great understanding of your own style. People think you’re cool and they’re right! People will always come to you for fashion and relationship advice. But make sure to ask for help yourself when you need it too.
results.Smug: You are the classiest person in every room and you don’t care who knows it. Your unique interests and niche sense of humour attract only the best people in your life. You may not be friends with everyone but the people you do let in are so glad to be there. Strut your stuff and don’t let anyone bring you down!
results.Uchi: You're like a sibling to your friends and always a great shoulder to cry on. You also know all the coolest places to listen to live music and are great to bring to a party. You will always stand up for your friends and your fierce loyalty makes you the perfect bestie.
results.Normal: You’re as sweet as apple pie and a great listener. You always put others' needs above your own and are very trusting in your friends. People say you give great hugs and chances are you make a great cup of tea. Make sure to treat yourself to some of that kindness too!
results.Jock: Boundless energy and a smile to match. You’re easy-going and people are naturally drawn to you. Your charisma and supportive nature means you’re the perfect cheerleader for your friends’ dreams. Don’t forget to stop and smell the flowers every once in a while!
results.Undetermined: It seems our robots had issues with finding out who you are... Maybe you could try again? ...again?
